name: Teh Kitteh
description:
Mini-Jam 80
Theme: Cats
Limitation: 8x8px sprites and textures

In this teeny-tiny platformer, you are a cat knocking potted plants off of shelves.

  • A or left-arrow to go left;
  • D or right-arrow to go right;
  • W or up-arrow or Space-bar to jump.

Software: Aseprite, ct.js
